p: The research showed that the Fe, Zn, and Pb content in the leaves of the trees growing along the streets was significantly higher than in the samples collected from the trees growing in the parks. There was a similar observation made about the content of Mn and Cd. Apart from the Mg content, the content of other elements measured in Kraków, Poznań and Wrocław was comparable with the values measured by other authors [ 96– 98].
